nodes.text: Slotern was a world where a battle was fought between the Galactic Empire and a resistance group sometime between the years 19 BBY and 1 BBY. The world was located in the Slotern system of the Wazta sector, which was located in the Outer Rim Territories.

Slotern was mentioned in the "TIE fighter" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010.
